thread.title: Michael Saffran
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Michael Saffran

author: Michael Saffran
title: Michael Saffran
text: We were very pleased with the Goway Travel arrangements for our vacation in New Zealznd and Australia. The Goway representative, Zarir, made excellent suggestions and was very responsive to all our questions. Goway's recommended tour company in New Zealznd was APT. We were quite impressed with APT's itinerary and service. All in all, a very good experience - we would certainly recommend Goway to other travellers.
